traits.name: Sense Heat
entries: The cold snap spirit can sense heat within 60 feet of it.

traits.name: Frozen Aura
entries: Any creature that starts its turn within 5 feet of a cold snap spirit takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) cold damage.

traits.name: Jealous Spirit
entries: If the spirit attacks a creature that is within 5 feet of another cold snap spirit, the attack deals an extra 10 ({@damage 3d6}) cold damage on a hit.

actions.name: Consume Warmth
entries: {@atk ms} +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 21 (6d6 damage) cold damage, and the target's speed is halved until the end of the spirit's next turn.

actions.name: Subzero Wave (1/Day)
entries: Each creature within 30 feet of the cold snap spirit must make a DC 15 Constitution {@quickref saving throws|PHB|2|1|saving throw}, taking 18 (4d8 damage) cold damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
